import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import Navbar from "../components/Navbar"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import BookCard from "../components/BookCard"; import { fetchDatabase, fetchFeaturedBooks, fetchNewBooks, fetchBestsellerBooks, fetchCategories, fetchPromotions, fetchStats, } from "../services/api"; function Home() { const [databaseData, setDatabaseData] = useState(null); const [featuredBooks, setFeaturedBooks] = useState([]); const [newBooks, setNewBooks] = useState([]); const [bestsellerBooks, setBestsellerBooks] = useState([]); const [categories, setCategories] = useState([]); const [promotions, setPromotions] = useState(null); const [stats, setStats] = useState(null); const navigate = useNavigate(); // Fetch data from API return (
{/* Navbar */} {/* Hero Section */}
{/* Special Offer Badge */}
Special Offer

Discover the World of Knowledge Through Books

Thousands of high-quality books at the best prices. Free shipping nationwide for orders from 200,000 VND.

{/* Stats Section */}
Free

Shipping

24/7

Support

100%

Authentic

99%

Satisfaction
{/* Stats Numbers Section */}

{stats?.totalBooks || "0"}

Books

{stats?.customers || "0"}

Customers

{stats?.support || "0"}

Support

{stats?.satisfaction || "0"}

Satisfaction
{/* Featured Books Section */}

Featured Books

{featuredBooks.map((book) => ( ))}
{/* Promotion Section */}

{promotions?.specialOffer?.title || ""}

{promotions?.specialOffer?.description || ""}

Valid from {promotions?.specialOffer?.startDate || ""} - {promotions?.specialOffer?.endDate || ""}

Time Remaining:
{formatNumber(countdown.days)}
Days
{formatNumber(countdown.hours)}
Hours
{formatNumber(countdown.minutes)}
Minutes
{formatNumber(countdown.seconds)}
Seconds
{/* Categories Section */}

Book Categories

{categories.filter(cat => cat.icon).map((category) => ( navigate( `/products?category=${encodeURIComponent( category.name.replace(/\*\*/g, "") )}` ) } > e.currentTarget.parentElement.style.transform = "translateY(-5px)"} onMouseLeave={(e) => e.currentTarget.parentElement.style.transform = "translateY(0)"} >
{category.name}

{category.bookCount ? category.bookCount.toLocaleString() + "+" : "Many"} books

))}
{/* New Books Section */}

New Books

{newBooks.map((book) => ( ))}
{/* Best Sellers Section */}

Best Seller

{bestsellerBooks.map((book) => ( ))}

); } export default Home;
